rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lounge
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading to a central courtyard. The lounge area incorporates Art Deco styling with geometric patterns, bold lines, and rich materials. Natural light is maximized through large windows.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A private suite with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Walls feature subtle Art Deco motifs and high ceilings for a grand feel.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2 & 3
rooms.description: Two bedrooms sharing a common corridor, each with sufficient space for personal items. Decor includes Art Deco inspired accents.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A dining area that opens into the courtyard, allowing for indoor-outdoor living. Art Deco detailing is incorporated in furniture and fixtures.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Servants Quarters Access
rooms.description: A modern kitchen with efficient layout and storage, along with a separate access area for the servant's quarters. The design includes Art Deco finishes.

rooms.name: Courtyard (Central Open Space)
rooms.description: A central courtyard providing ventilation and light, integrated with landscaping elements such as a water feature and greenery. It serves as the heart of the bungalow.

rooms.name: Utility & Storage Room
rooms.description: A room designated for storage and utilities, including water heaters and cleaning supplies. Incorporates Art Deco detailing subtly.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom with its own bathroom, ensuring privacy. Art Deco accents are used to enhance visual appeal.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: A compact living space for the domestic staff, including a bedroom and small kitchenette. The design is functional with an Art Deco-inspired aesthetic.

openings.description: A large, Art Deco styled door with a glass transom to allow natural light and provide an inviting welcome.
Strategically placed windows across all rooms for optimal ventilation and alignment with Vastu principles.
Balconies adjacent to living areas, overlooking the central courtyard.
